description: Try our easy to follow Pea, Corn & Ham Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pea, Corn & Ham Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease 2 x 1 1/2 cup ovenproof dishes and place onto a baking tray.
Roughly tear 2 crusty bread rolls into bite sized pieces and divide evenly between dishes.
Chop 2 slices leg ham and combine with 1/2 up frozen peas and 1/2 cup frozen corn kernels. Scatter over bread.
In a jug, whisk together 3 eggs, 300ml pouring cream and season with salt and pepper.
Pour into dishes and set aside for 5 minutes.
Scatter 1/4 cup grated tasty cheese over each then top with a single layer of frozen sweet potato fries.
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes until fries are golden and bake has set.
